scripts.cleanup: rm -rf dist && rm -rf nodejs && rm -rf layer.zip && rm -rf index.zip
scripts.setup-layer: mkdir -p nodejs && cp package.json nodejs/package.json && cp package-lock.json nodejs/package-lock.json && cp -r ./node_modules nodejs/
scripts.bundle-layer: npm run cleanup && npm run setup-layer && npm run zip-layer
scripts.publish-fn: npm run cleanup && npm run build-code && npm run zip-code && npm run lambda-deploy && npm run cleanup
scripts.publish-layer: npm run bundle-layer && aws lambda publish-layer-version --layer-name ws-onconnect-layer --zip-file fileb://layer.zip --compatible-runtimes nodejs18.x nodejs16.x nodejs14.x && npm run cleanup
